name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
description: Basic principles of aerodynamics and airflow.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces
lessons.description: Understanding lift, drag, and thrust.

lessons.name: Airfoil Design
lessons.description: Principles of airfoil design.

lessons.name: Wind Tunnels
lessons.description: How wind tunnels are used in aerodynamic testing.

name: Aerodynamic Design
description: Design principles for aerodynamic efficiency.

lessons.name: Airplane Wing Design
lessons.description: Principles of designing airplane wings for optimal performance.

lessons.name: Drag and Lift
lessons.description: Exploring the relationship between drag and lift.

lessons.name: Flow Separation
lessons.description: Understanding flow separation in aerodynamics.

name: Advanced Aerodynamics
description: Exploring advanced concepts in aerodynamics for supersonic and hypersonic flows.

lessons.name: Supersonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Principles of aerodynamics in supersonic flow.

lessons.name: Hypersonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Exploring aerodynamics in hypersonic conditions.

lessons.name: Shock Waves
lessons.description: Understanding shock waves in supersonic and hypersonic flows.

name: Spacecraft Structure
description: Understanding spacecraft structural systems and their components.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Materials
lessons.description: Overview of materials used in spacecraft construction.

lessons.name: Structural Design
lessons.description: Principles of structural design in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Structural Analysis
lessons.description: Analyzing spacecraft structures for strength and stability.

name: Spacecraft Propulsion Systems
description: Understanding the principles of spacecraft propulsion systems.

lessons.name: Chemical Propulsion
lessons.description: Exploring chemical propulsion systems used in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Electric Propulsion
lessons.description: Understanding electric propulsion technologies.

lessons.name: Propellant Types
lessons.description: Overview of propellant types used in spacecraft propulsion.

name: Thermal Control in Spacecraft
description: Techniques and strategies for controlling spacecraft temperature.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Understanding systems used for thermal protection in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Radiation and Insulation
lessons.description: Exploring how radiation and insulation are used for spacecraft thermal control.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in Space
lessons.description: Understanding heat transfer mechanisms in space environments.

name: Introduction to Organic Chemistry
description: Overview of organic chemistry fundamentals.

lessons.name: Organic Molecules
lessons.description: Understanding the structure of organic molecules.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons
lessons.description: Exploring the properties of hydrocarbons.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Detailed analysis of functional groups in organic chemistry.

name: Organic Reactions
description: Detailed understanding of organic reactions and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Overview of organic reaction mechanisms.

lessons.name: Stereochemistry
lessons.description: Understanding the spatial arrangement of atoms in molecules.

lessons.name: Organic Synthesis
lessons.description: Principles and techniques of organic synthesis.

name: Spectroscopic Methods
description: Techniques for determining the structure of organic molecules.

lessons.name: NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Using NMR spectroscopy to study organic molecules.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Principles of mass spectrometry for organic analysis.

lessons.name: IR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Using IR spectroscopy to identify organic compounds.

name: Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
description: Overview of the fundamental principles of inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Periodic Table and Element Properties
lessons.description: Understanding the periodic table and the properties of elements.

lessons.name: Coordination Compounds
lessons.description: Exploring the formation and structure of coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Bonding Theories
lessons.description: Introduction to bonding theories in inorganic compounds.

name: Inorganic Reaction Mechanisms
description: Exploring the mechanisms behind inorganic reactions.

lessons.name: Substitution Reactions
lessons.description: Understanding substitution reactions in inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Oxidation-Reduction Reactions
lessons.description: Study of redox reactions in inorganic systems.

lessons.name: Catalysis
lessons.description: Overview of catalysis in inorganic chemistry.

name: Advanced Coordination Chemistry
description: In-depth study of coordination chemistry and its applications.

lessons.name: Ligand Field Theory
lessons.description: Exploring ligand field theory and its importance in coordination chemistry.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Understanding crystal field theory and its applications.

lessons.name: Magnetic Properties of Coordination Complexes
lessons.description: Study of the magnetic properties of coordination compounds.

name: Introduction to Physical Chemistry
description: Overview of the fundamental principles of physical chemistry.

lessons.name: Thermodynamics Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to the laws of thermodynamics and their applications.

lessons.name: Kinetics and Reaction Rates
lessons.description: Understanding the principles of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms.

lessons.name: Quantum Mechanics in Chemistry
lessons.description: An introduction to the application of quantum mechanics in chemical systems.

name: Advanced Thermodynamics
description: In-depth study of thermodynamic principles and their chemical applications.

lessons.name: Entropy and Free Energy
lessons.description: Understanding entropy, free energy, and their roles in chemical processes.

lessons.name: Phase Equilibria
lessons.description: Exploring phase transitions and equilibrium in chemical systems.

lessons.name: Thermodynamics of Solutions
lessons.description: Detailed study of solutions and their thermodynamic properties.

name: Spectroscopy and Quantum Chemistry
description: Techniques of spectroscopy and their application in quantum chemistry.

lessons.name: Molecular Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Introduction to spectroscopy and its role in understanding molecular structure.

lessons.name: Quantum Chemical Models
lessons.description: Application of quantum models to chemical problems.

lessons.name: Infrared and Raman Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Detailed exploration of IR and Raman spectroscopy techniques.

name: Introduction to Elvish Linguistics
description: Overview of the Elvish languages in Middle-earth, focusing on Sindarin and Quenya.

lessons.name: Sindarin Basics
lessons.description: Learning the basic structure and grammar of Sindarin.

lessons.name: Quenya Vocabulary
lessons.description: Building vocabulary in the Quenya language.

lessons.name: Elvish Writing Systems
lessons.description: Introduction to Tengwar and other Elvish writing systems.

name: Dwarvish and Black Speech
description: Study of the Dwarvish language Khuzdul and the Black Speech of Mordor.

lessons.name: Khuzdul Grammar
lessons.description: An introduction to the structure and grammar of Khuzdul.

lessons.name: Khuzdul Vocabulary
lessons.description: Building a basic vocabulary in Khuzdul.

lessons.name: The Black Speech
lessons.description: Exploration of the Black Speech of Mordor and its role in Middle-earth.

name: Historical Linguistics of Middle-earth
description: Study of the evolution and history of languages in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Language Evolution
lessons.description: How languages in Middle-earth evolved over time.

lessons.name: Inscriptions and Texts
lessons.description: Deciphering ancient inscriptions and texts in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Philological Studies
lessons.description: A philological analysis of the languages of Middle-earth.

name: Diplomatic Relations in Middle-earth
description: Exploring the principles of diplomacy between the races of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Council of Elrond
lessons.description: A case study on the diplomatic discussions at the Council of Elrond.

lessons.name: Elves and Men
lessons.description: Examining the historical relationships between Elves and Men.

lessons.name: Diplomacy in the War of the Ring
lessons.description: Understanding diplomatic strategies during the War of the Ring.

name: Inter-species Alliances
description: Exploration of alliances between different races in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The Last Alliance
lessons.description: Understanding the significance of the Last Alliance of Elves and Men.

lessons.name: Friendship between Elves and Dwarves
lessons.description: Case study on the historical friendship and conflicts between Elves and Dwarves.

lessons.name: The Role of Wizards in Diplomacy
lessons.description: Exploring how Wizards shaped the diplomatic landscape of Middle-earth.

name: Leadership and Diplomacy
description: Study of the leadership qualities that influenced diplomacy in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Leadership of Aragorn
lessons.description: An analysis of Aragorn's leadership style and its impact on diplomacy.

lessons.name: The Stewardship of Gondor
lessons.description: Exploring the role of the Stewards of Gondor in maintaining diplomacy.

lessons.name: Leadership of Elrond and Galadriel
lessons.description: Study of Elrond and Galadriel's leadership and diplomatic efforts.
